summary: MY 2017 F250 IS EXPERIENCING ' DEATH WOBBLE '. AT SPEEDS OF 50 MPH OR MORE, ANY BUMP IN THE ROAD SHIMMIES THE STEERING WHEEL AND AT TIMES THE FRONT END OF THE TRUCK WILL VIOLENTLY SHIMMY TO THE POINT THAT I HAVE NO STEERING CONTROL AND AM FORCED TO SLOW DOWN TO 25-20 MPH TO GET IT TO STOP.
